title: Tobacco Consumption, Manufactured Tobacco and Snuff for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data,1915-1954 (2)--Original Data, 1952-1954. Source: Survey Of Current Business, July 1953 And Following Issues.

This NBER data series m01088b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01088b
